content: **knitted slippers in 2 strands drops fabel piece is worked in rib and in garter stitch size 35 to 43** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-475 yarn group a + a or c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot length 22-24-27 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 901 candy 50-50-50 g colour 542 green needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch and 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
